data.message: Hey Facebook! , I've applied for the waiting list for the new design long time ago .. and guess what :/ some of my friends who don't even know about the new design they got it , and I didn't .. so, what's the problem ? :/

replies.message: Hi Mohammad. We are rolling out the new design slowly and listening to audience feedback. Thanks for your patience. - Kristen

Thanks for replying , but what is the use of the waiting list if u r going to apply the design for the people who didn't apply at first place in the waiting list first and apply the new design for the people who applied for the waiting list later ??
